name: NFT ML10 MIRROR METALEMISSIVE
description:
# MetalEmissive Collection
MetalEmissive is an artistic series of 3D NFTs designed by [**Universelle**](https://universelle.io/en) for the [**NOX** brand](https://noxsport.es), based on the rackets of international paddle players Miguel Lamperti and Agust√≠n Tapia. Where his inspiration is born from the idealization of a medal carved in paddle rackets, culminating with an iconographic transgression of colors, reflections, light emissions and materials that make dream that those rackets could reach real life.

The common thread lies in light **emissions** and **metallic** materials, impossible to integrate both in this support in the real world, and so linked to current styles and trends within the Metaverse.

attributes.value: 10% off for life in NOX products (in NOX online store)
Gift of physical racket ML10 PRO CUP LTD 2023
Gift of Serial NFT ML10 PRO CUP LTD 2023
Gift of A. Tapia Decentraland Wearable
Double Invitation to the World Padel Tour Barcelona (December 2022)
Delivery in person of the racket ML10 PRO CUP LTD 2023 by Miguel Lamperti
